item.title: VIDEO DISPLAY CORP 10-K
item.description: VIDEO DISPLAY CORP, which is in the Electronic Components & Accessories [3670] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 30, 2023 had 12800 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 394 instances 2023 - 155 instances february - 143 instances 28 - 139 instances financial - 113 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
